epd_metadata.declaration_owner: Holcim México Operaciones S.A. de C.V.

product_description.product_scope: 48 concrete mixes manufactured at the El Marques facility

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with procedures for creating a Type III EPD and publish it for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of total inflows (mass and energy) included.
lca_information.data_sources: ecoinvent V3.8 database, Holcim primary data for 2022

data_quality_assessment.precision: Measured and calculated data validated by LCA practitioner and 3rd Party Verifier.
data_quality_assessment.completeness: All relevant processes considered and modeled.
data_quality_assessment.consistency: Uniform methodology applied across all inputs.
data_quality_assessment.representativeness: Data from 2022, region-specific electricity inputs used.

end_of_life.excluded_stages: Transportation to site, on-site construction, building use and maintenance, end-of-life effects.

carbon_emission_context.limitations: EPD does not support definitive comparisons of environmental performance.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_materials: Returned concrete based on Holcim primary data for 2022.

additional_info.regulated_substances: No regulated substances of very high concern are utilized on site.
